name: Doll Dress Up 3: Sweet Girl
description:
Have you ever dreamed of being a super fashionista?
Now make your dream come true with Sweet Doll Dress Up.
You can dress up your doll like a superstar, make her be a princess or send her to school! As long as you want, you can dress her up in any style.

To show your doll in the best look, you can also make her some DIY runway and decor your own bedroom, living room or kitchen. Let you be “fashion” even in the way you create your house.

So what do we provide in the game to make your dream come true?
- So many skin tone and eyes color for your character
- Beauty salon with modern hair style
- Mix and match with hundred of items in the closet
- Various expression for your doll
- Bling bling and cutie accessories just for you
- Amazed you with the fantasy collection in wardrobe
- If you have no idea how to dress your doll up, we’ll give your baby a thousand suggestions.

Now, are you ready to show us what you can do in Sweet Girl?
